document.full_text: mr. boogaard was an enforcer for the new york rangers, and had signed a four-year, $6.5 million deal with the team in july.
document.title: rangers forward derek boogaard dies at 28
lines_and_colors: mr. boogaard was an enforcer for the new york rangers, and had signed a four-year, $6.5 million deal with the team in july.
